bug.author: cheyang
bug.summary: Make Alluxio helm chart configurable for hostNetwork or not
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: 2.2.0
The current implementation on Helm chart only supports non-hostnetwork environment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/commit/4d6126a5d9e03128c01ca73f2a8cad12558e981c>4d6126a</denchmark-link>
I suggest to make it configurable? the user can decide whether they want hostNetwork or non-hostNetwork. In fact, the network performance is much worse when using non hostNetwork. I To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior (as minimally and precisely as possible) Expected behavior A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. Urgency Describe the impact and urgency of the bug. Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.

comments.comment: After <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/commit/4d6126a5d9e03128c01ca73f2a8cad12558e981c>4d6126a</denchmark-link> when ALLUXIO_WORKER_CONTAINTER_HOSTNAME is set on worker, the connections to worker will use this hostname even if the worker is using . Per discussion, I'll apply a small fix to remove ALLUXIO_WORKER_CONTAINTER_HOSTNAME when the workers are using .

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/cheyang>@cheyang</denchmark-link> please take a look if <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/pull/11290>#11290</denchmark-link> meets your need. Thanks!
